# Videos from session #06

![][13]![][14]

 _Front-end setup + Web3.js scaffold + Smart contract interactions:
Queries, mutations, and listening to events_

We held our 6th session - on testing [smart contract](https://www.letsplayfx.com/blog/smart-contract-on-blockchain/)s - on Tuesday
evening at Chainstack.

During the session we learnt [how to](https://www.playgroundfx.com/blog/forex-trading-how-to/) build a front-end web application
for our DApp. We began by building a "regular" web application - HTML,
CSS, and Javascript - then scaffolding web3.js [Libra](https://www.playgroundfx.com/blog/libra-creator/)ry on it, connecting
it to the web3 provider injected by MetaMask. Finally, we used this to
allow the user to interact with our [smart contract](https://www.letsplayfx.com/blog/smart-contract-on-blockchain/)s in a variety of
ways: querying it, changing its state, and listening to events emitted
by it.

For all of the details, please check out [the summary post for this
session][15].

## Throwback

In session #05, there was a question, about compiled vs deployed byte
code, and how truffle deals with that. Then in this session, we
addressed that. Here's a link which jumps right to that bit:

aoe‚ðŸŽžaoe‚ [Truffle's `build/contracts` folder][19]

## Thanks

A big thanks to [Gerald Nah][20] for helping with the recordings,, to
[Ashlie][21] from [Chainstack][22], and Dennis from [Acronis][23]

Also thanks to EngineersSG, especially [Michael Cheng][24], for their
excellent [DIY tech meetup recording guide][25] without which we would
probably have no recordings!

## News

As mentioned in our previous video posts, all of our videos are now
available on Engineers.SG!

Check us out: [DApps Dev Club on Engineers.SG][26]

## Reflections

In this session, the intro and outro videos are missing. The intro video
was corrupt somehow, and only parts of it were salvageable, thus it only
starts at the part where we recap the previous session. The outro video
recorded was completely lost after approximately 10 seconds.

We're unsure what caused this, and are still working it out. Apologies
if you you missed this session, and are unable to watch the recordings
in full!

![S][27] _Sorry, but we've got no retakes!_

The saving grace is that we still have all of the main content recorded
- the materials for this session plus the hands-on exercises are all
there.

## Next session

RSVPs are now open for our _next_ session - please let us know if you're
attending, as it helps us plan in advance:

[**RSVP** on eventbrite][28]

See you all again soon! ðŸ¤˜
